load_dotenv.purpose: Load environment variables from .env file into OS environment

DB_URI.purpose: PostgreSQL connection string constructed from Supabase credentials

get_setting.purpose: Safely retrieve environment variable with optional default value

validate_required_settings.purpose: Verify all critical environment variables present, raise error if missing

MCPCategory.purpose: TypeScript union type defining valid MCP server categories

getMCPCategory.purpose: Determine which MCP category a tool belongs to based on its name

CATEGORY_ICONS.purpose: Map each MCP category to its emoji icon for visual display

CATEGORY_COLORS.purpose: Map each MCP category to Tailwind CSS classes for badge styling

make_backend.purpose: Create CompositeBackend routing /memories/ to persistent storage

store.purpose: PostgresStore instance for long-term memory persistence in Supabase

checkpointer.purpose: PostgresSaver instance for agent state persistence after each step

python_repl.purpose: PythonREPLTool for code execution implementing Anthropic pattern

system_prompt.purpose: Comprehensive agent instructions including skills-first workflow

subagents.purpose: List of specialized subagent configurations for delegation

agent.purpose: DeepAgent instance with all tools, middleware, and configuration

graph.purpose: Compiled LangGraph ready for deployment and execution

logger.purpose: Logger instance for recording MCP initialization events and errors

init_supabase_mcp.purpose: Initialize Supabase MCP client and return database tools list

init_tavily_mcp.purpose: Initialize Tavily MCP client and return web search tools list

init_gmail_mcp.purpose: Initialize Gmail MCP client and return email tools list

init_calendar_mcp.purpose: Initialize Google Calendar MCP client and return scheduling tools list

supabase_tools.purpose: List of Supabase database tools for agent use

tavily_tools.purpose: List of Tavily web search tools for agent use

gmail_tools.purpose: List of Gmail email tools for agent use

calendar_tools.purpose: List of Google Calendar scheduling tools for agent use

CodeExecutionBoxProps.purpose: TypeScript props interface for CodeExecutionBox component

getStatusIcon.purpose: Return appropriate icon component based on execution status

CodeExecutionBox.purpose: React component rendering Python code execution with syntax highlighting
